<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sacrifice Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1678) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=76) (Level 10)

**Trigger**
You are hit by a Strike that deals physical damage.

</column>

---

With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack. Reduce the damage you take by an amount equal to twice your armor's level. Your armor becomes broken, reducing its Hit Points to its Broken Threshold. If your armor was already damaged, it is destroyed instead.

<title level="2">Sacrifice Armor leads to...</title>
[Greater Interpose](/Feats.aspx?ID=1688)
name: Sacrifice Armor
